prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon resembling a prehistoric creature with a shell and tentacles.
Design a fossil-inspired Pokemon with a golden body and vibrant blue limbs.
Generate an ancient aquatic Pokemon that has both a spiral shell and tentacle-like arms.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines features of a snail and an octopus, with a unique color scheme.
Show me a unique Pokemon with a hard shell and striking blue appendages, perfect for underwater battles.
Make a Pokemon that looks like it came from the ocean floor, featuring a mix of earthy and bright colors.
Give me a creature that has a rocky exterior and fluid movements, embodying the essence of a prehistoric sea dweller.
